thread.title: Former Lake County coroner indicted on 5 counts of perjury | Chicago Sun-Times
thread.title_full: Former Lake County coroner indicted on 5 counts of perjury | Chicago Sun-Times

title: Former Lake County coroner indicted on 5 counts of perjury | Chicago Sun-Times
text:
Former Lake County coroner indicted on 5 counts of perjury 
Dr. Thomas J. Rudd | Sun-Times file photo @byjordanowen | Sign-Up for our News & Politics Newsletter Sign-Up 
Former Lake County Coroner Dr. Thomas Rudd has been indicted on perjury charges, the Lake County sheriff’s office announced Wednesday. 
A Lake County grand jury indicted Rudd on five felony counts of perjury Wednesday. The charges stem from a one-year investigation conducted by the sheriff’s office and Office of Professional Standards. 
A $150,000 arrest warrant was issued for Rudd following the indictment, according to the sheriff’s office. 
More details were expected to be released at a press conference Wednesday evening. Previously from Chicago News
